---
title: "About"
---


This website and slides were created for the  __[Creating Professional Presentations and Websites using R/Quarto](https://whova.com/embedded/session/hRqar%40ceM1oCRxx8SaTASu%40-ruGH1z6nVU55djYhzR8%3D/4627683/?widget=primary)__ workshop presented at the [2025 WNAR/IMS Annual Meeting](https://wnarofibs.wildapricot.org/wnar2025){target="_blank"} on June 15, 2025.

The website structure was set up to be used as an example for demonstrating options when creating websites using Quarto in RStudio. See [Part 3 slides](slides/part3_webpages.qmd) for more information.
